data.name: The Little Brave Demo
data.detailed_description:
Undertake a dangerous journey into mysterious forbidden lands to reveal secrets of the legendary past, find the last pieces of gone magic, and gain bravery on your path in this exciting adventure of the cute little hero.



The Little Brave is a 2D action-adventure metroidvania genre video game about a little hero by the name of Keely who decided to undertake a dangerous journey. This is an exciting adventure in which Keely will reveal the secrets of ancient legends, gain the bravery and strength on the path.

Test your courage in this demo adventure of The Little Brave. Find a way through an abandoned mine to the vault of one of the last pieces of gone magic. Overcome the challenge and defeat the mighty warden.
